document_data.name: Eshuna
document_data.mainbody: '''Eshuna''' was a [[dragonborn]] [[knight]] and the quartermaster of the [[Platinum Cadre]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tools of the Trade|34}}
document_data.Activities: He was also in charge of the security of the village of [[Ruinspoke]], and as such he was tasked to seek out and recruit trustworthy [[adventurer]]s when needed.
